name: kishore-portfolio-free
title: Kishore Portfolio Free
desc: This is version of free Kishore portfolio template, this template was designed with stunning animations in mind with clean aesthetic look This template have animations from GSAP & custom made Fade in animations!
article:
About Sections


this is free version of pro kishiore portfolio, you can get pro version [https://codexcode.store/themes/kishore-portfolio](link)


All blocks was created with **React** and **Typescript** and all functionality is setup by **astro.build**

This means that even if you don't like **astro**, you can copy blocks from this project and easy use it with other languages like **next.js**!


This is version of free Kishore portfolio template, this template was designed with stunning animations in mind with clean aesthetic look This template have animations from GSAP & custom made Fade in animations!

Pages ready to use:


-  Homepage - This is Landing page only website
